Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Traces of battles have extended all this way. That's the other side of the fork in the road we passed.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Look at the walls. There are fresh marks apart from bullet holes and signs of explosives.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'It seems that Kamui was also heading in this direction.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "She said she needed to help Rohacchi search for a mural, so she wasn't coming with us this time. That way, she could also help us divert some of the Corrupted.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Time is short, everyone. I'll be heading out first.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Hold on, Bianca. It's not a good idea to journey alone.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Which is why I have to go first. The Purifying Force excels at pursuitsâ€”I'll save much more time travelling by myself.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "No one can guarantee how stable Kamui is at this point. If he's indeed down this path, I cannot let Karen take on him alone.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...Stay safe. We'll catch up as quickly as possible.", 4: '1'}
